title: Events
subtitle: Join various events of Apache Airflow Korea User Group

meetup.title: Meet us on Meetup!
meetup.description: All events of Apache Airflow Korea User Group are announced on Meetup.com. Check out the latest event information and join us!

regularMeetup.title: Regular Meetups
regularMeetup.description: We host regular meetups 1-2 times per month

offlineMeeting.title: Offline Meetings
offlineMeeting.description: Meet us in various cities like Seoul and Busan

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: Share experiences with other Airflow users

notifications.title: Real-time Notifications
notifications.description: Get event notifications by joining Meetup

steps.title: Check Events
steps.description: Check upcoming events on Meetup or community channels.

steps.title: Pre-registration
steps.description: Please register in advance through the registration link.

steps.title: Check Schedule
steps.description: Check the final schedule through email or channel announcements.

steps.title: Participate & Network
steps.description: Participate in events to share knowledge and network with peers.

speakers.title: Looking for Speakers!
speakers.description: Want to share your Apache Airflow-related experience and knowledge with the community? Join us as a speaker!
